Text: Remove the default map size limit of 256x256.
Allow saving your normal game into maps. The buttons will appear in the top-left corner while you play the game. You can also upload that map to the Steam Workshop. NOT in Map Editor.

When saving a map, revert the buildings to their original locked state. You may have unlocked them while making the map. If you do not check this, the buildings will remain unlocked for players starting a new game.
The default water source strength when placing water sources in the Map Editor. This applies to both fresh and contaminated water sources.
